DataCommand.Name: QueryPurchaseOrderByConditions
DataCommand.CommandText:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT po.SysNo, customer.CustomerID as BuyerName, po.VendorSysNo, vendor.VendorName, po.ProductSysNo, product.ProductName, po.BuyerDescription, po.BuyerContacts, po.Status FROM QYPO.PurchaseOrder po INNER JOIN QYPO.Vendor vendor ON vendor.SysNo = po.VendorSysNo INNER JOIN QYCMS.Product product ON product.SysNo = po.ProductSysNo INNER JOIN QYCustomer.CustomerBasic customer ON customer.SysNo = po.BuyerSysNo WHERE po.BuyerSysNo = @CustomerSysNo AND po.CompanyCode = @CompanyCode #WhereStr# ORDER BY 1 DESC ) AS QueryResult LIMIT @StartIndex,@PageSize;
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) FROM QYPO.PurchaseOrder po INNER JOIN QYPO.Vendor vendor ON vendor.SysNo = po.VendorSysNo INNER JOIN QYCMS.Product product ON product.SysNo = po.ProductSysNo INNER JOIN QYCustomer.CustomerBasic customer ON customer.SysNo = po.BuyerSysNo WHERE po.BuyerSysNo = @CustomerSysNo AND po.CompanyCode = @CompanyCode #WhereStr# ORDER BY 1 DESC

DataCommand.Name: QueryPurchaseProductByConditions
DataCommand.CommandText:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT product.SysNo ,product.ProductName ,IFNULL(product.ProductSpec,"") as Specifications ,IFNULL(product.ProductTitle,"") as ProductOriginPlace ,vendor.SysNo AS VendorSysNo ,vendor.VendorName ,price.CurrentPrice ,product.MinOrderQty FROM QYCMS.Product product INNER JOIN QYPO.Vendor vendor ON vendor.SysNo = product.VendorSysNo INNER JOIN QYCMS.SubStoreProduct price ON product.SysNo = price.ProductSysNo AND price.SubStoreCode = 'sh' WHERE @CompanyCode = product.CompanyCode AND product.Status IN(2,4) #WhereStr# ORDER BY 1 DESC ) AS QueryResult LIMIT @StartIndex,@PageSize;
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) FROM QYCMS.Product product INNER JOIN QYPO.Vendor vendor ON vendor.SysNo = product.VendorSysNo INNER JOIN QYCMS.Product_Price price ON product.SysNo = price.ProductSysNo WHERE @CompanyCode = product.CompanyCode AND product.Status IN(2,4) #WhereStr# ORDER BY 1 DESC

DataCommand.Name: Church.FetchChurchInfomation
DataCommand.CommandText: SELECT TOP 1 [CHURCH_ID] as ChurchId, [CHURCH_NAME] as ChurchName, [CHURCH_CODE] as ChurchCode FROM [ChmChurch].[dbo].[Church] as church WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE church.[CHURCH_ID] = @ChurchId
